case.state: (I think I should remove the battery from the car before they make a move.)
(Nobody is scared... this is getting awkward.)
(Why no one is scared? This is getting awful.)
(Should I start killing them? I'm gonna try something different this time.)

This day... is so special.
♫You would never want me to appear {br} You never want this to be over {br} You never want it to reach out of the edge of time♫

Oh, what a beatiful butterfly.
Hmm, it's the first time that no one runs away from me, my name is Jason. Yes, That Jason.
Games like these aren't a luxury I can enjoy often.
I suppose some of you must know me, but if you didn't, my name is Jason.
Hi, you can call me Jason.
Some counselors back at the camp used to play this game, I hope it's fun as it seems. I'm Jason.
~cards~ cards, please.
Just ~cards~.
~cards~ cards will enough.
Hahaha!
This feels like when I have someone cornered, and I'm poised to deal the finishing blow...

That feeling when you know they can't run anymore. Beautiful.
Don't expect me to go easy on you.

I think I won't lose...
I may be naked, but I'm certainly not helpless.
Anyone wish to know what I got? Well, keep wishing.
I don't need my gloves to play this game.
I never played poker before, but I'm doing a nice job with this.
This game is either ridiculously easy or I have incredibly good luck...
You're already done for, so you might as well give up!

I will never die.
I could probably make a lot of money with skills like these. But money can't buy what I really want.
I won't have mercy on you all. I never show mercy.
Good thing I learned a bit of poker before playing.
I don't need medical attention, I need to win!
I never go anywhere without my mask! Glad to know I can win without it.
Here's a little payback for my mask!
Anything that will keep me dressed is great.
I lost the mask, but at least my boobies are safe.

In case it isn't obvious, I'm not used to showing off my boobies. But you won't be seeing my pussy.
Could you please stop staring? Thanks.
Nothing to worry... not even bullets can't stop me.
I'm unstoppable.
I can beat anyone in a one on one fight! I'm not sure when it comes to card games though.
Don't let your guard down, ~player~.
I'm not afraid of anyone.
I'll win this time, just wait and see.
I know my panties don't fit me at all, but neither does this hand.

I don't expect to win.
I guess that dumb poker book wasn't useful after all. It couldn't warn me about this.
I probably won't win at this rate, but I'm seeing things through to the bitter end.
Don't keep me waiting, I wanna know if I'll lose.
This isn't good but... I guess it's better than nothing.
People bet money on this, right? I don't have any cash to bet, sadly.
I need something better next time. But it'll work for now.
My machete would make this game go much faster... but I think I'll be safe without it.
I bet someone has a worse hand than this.
This is like a rusty knife. It can be useful but you can't trust in it.

Don't worry about the cuts. I've lived through worse.

Don't worry about me, ~player~. I'll be fine.

Don't underestimate me...
Well, this doesn't seem like rocket science... but...
I'm feeling surprisingly vulnerable.
Is this what it's like for all those people I kill? Being totally defenseless and afraid of what will happen next?

I feel like one of my victims right now... but they're only butt naked about 50% of the time.
I feel really vulnerable... almost like those counselors I slaughtered.

This feels worse than when people call the cops on me.

I can change my cards again, right? No? Oh.

This game is way harder than it needs to be.
Oh no, I don't wanna lose again...
I don't wanna show myself, I'm not a slut.
I'm not insecure about my body but I don't like to exhibit myself.
This is the first time that someone will see me nude, apart from Freddy, that stupid pervert.
No... Not my panties too...
I'm starting to get hungry...
This is getting me a bit tense... I hope there's some counselors in the camp, when I'm back.
You got my bra, and now you're trying to get my panties. How despicable.
You both wanna fight me!? Go ahead! I wanna see your face when I crush it!
Come on make a move. I dare you!
(Is she just waiting to be executed or...)
Sounds like fun, yeah why not?
I don't think you have a house anymore...
I don't drink but I could eat something.
Punk rock, the camp counselors can't get enough of that stuff...
Just punk rock, it's the only thing that the counselors listen to at camp...
I wouldn't mind. In fact I'd find it lovely.
I can't believe today is my birthday! I should have brought a cake...
Hello, ~player~. It's good that you are here, if you didn't know today is my birthday!
Just punk rock.

{small}I killed those stupid counselors, they preferred to fuck in the woods and get high instead of looking after the kids, also they killed my mother. But I won't stop, I'll take care of everyone at Camp Crystal Lake!
{small}Those stupid counselors, they let me die just because they were too busy fucking and getting high, one of them killed my mother, that's why I'll get rid of everyone at Camp Crystal Lake!
I'm what you might call a serial killer. But I'm feeling unusually merciful today. I don't feel like killing you all (yet), so I'll just play the game if that's cool with everyone.

{small}}You should all be thankful that I'm feeling so merciful today. Were this any other day, your guts would be strewn all over the place. But I'm not in a killing mood today, so lets pretend I didn't say that.
This place feels like home.
There's no better place for a serial killer to be than the spooky woods.
I feel comfortable here. Serial killers are more powerful in the darkness.
I prefer to be alone. Or at least without a crowd staring at me.
Those people would be running in terror if they knew what was good for them.
Why are we playing here? There's too many people!
I'm really far from home...
I don't always come here to the city...
I could probably survive a fall from this height. But I doubt the rest of you could.
This place is for disposing of bodies, not for the playing of strip poker!
Playing strip poker in a dirty alley? We really are hopeless, aren't we?
This mansion looks like the Jarvis house...
Awesome! Once I'm done with you all, this is going to make cleaning off the blood so easy.
I can't remember the last time I took a warm bath. Crystal Lake only has cold showers.
Normally, skinny dipping teenagers are easy prey for me. But now I'm the one who wants to go skinny dipping.
Would anyone like to go skinny dipping? I'm normally not too fond of skinny dippers, but this isn't exactly a normal day now is it?
The water looks so clean. Crystal Lake is filthy, probably because of all the bodies I dump in it.
Just you and me, ~opponent~. Come on, let's finish this.
Hehehe! Time to land the final killing blow!
I can take several guys at once. Make of that what you will.
It feels weird to be the only girl here...
You wouldn't gang up on an innocent girl like me, would you?
No wonder why everyone is staring at me, I'm the only girl here.
(All those guys, what if they do something to me?)
Don't try anything funny, ok?

I thought there would be more guys here... but...
{small}You wouldn't happen to have seen Freddy Krueger around here, would you? Tall, long blonde hair, clawed glove, insatiable libido? Me and her go a long way back, and we're not exactly friends.

{small}If you think I'm crazy, wait until you get a load of Freddy Krueger! She'll dazzle you with her charming looks, and before you know it, you'll be naked, covered in cum, and bleeding out in a ditch.
Yes, why do you ask?
Yeah, why do you ask?
Just what this place needed, a spoiled narcissistic girl who thinks she is better than everybody. At least at the camp I could get rid of people like you.
I would love to see you try something! You sound just like those stupid teens.
Yeah, you're right, I shouldn't swing my machete aimlessly. Next time I'll be sure to hit something, like your head for example.
